_sText:
DE CHANGES 2 by MasterW3
The terrorists will be assaulting two of four known targets.  
Only TWO of these targets will be active, marked by signs on the billboards, according to our sources.
You will also be told which sites are active, as well as a Weather Update, by the Console.

The potential targets are as follows:   
A: the TRUCK that the barrels are shipped to the warehouse in. They may plant an explosive inside the vehicle.  
B: the Warehouse that loads the barrels onto the train could be a target.  that would shut down the whole operation.  
C: a Waste Storage Tower near the warehouse may also be a target.  By creating a massive spill, they could be making a statement about the dangers of these chemicals they believe to be toxic.  
D: We also believe that there may be evidence of alien life on a truck at a nearby Terminal Hotel.  The government may be using this group to destroy this potential evidence.  Stop them at all costs, the world has a right to know if this is true.
